text: Mind How You Go is Skye Edwards's debut solo album, following her departure from Morcheeba. Despite anticipation by fans, the album achieved limited success in the UK as a result of insufficient promotion. It was more successful in other parts of Europe, particularly Poland, France, Italy and Switzerland. ==Track listing== # "Love Show" (Skye Edwards, Gary Clark) – 4:03 # "Stop Complaining" (Edwards, Patrick Leonard ) – 3:37 # "Solitary" (Edwards, Leonard, Steve Gordon ) – 4:55 # "Calling" (Edwards, Gordon, Leonard) – 5:23 # "What's Wrong With Me?" (Edwards, Leonard) – 3:37 # "No Other" (Edwards, Gordon, Pascal Gabriel) – 4:04 # "Tell Me About Your Day" (Edwards, Leonard) – 4:00 # "All the Promises" (Edwards, Leonard, Gordon) – 4:08 # "Powerful" (Edwards, Gary Clark) – 4:43 # "Say Amen" (Edwards, Gordon, Leonard) – 4:31 # "Jamaica Days" (Edwards, Daniel Lanois) – 4:24 == References == Category:2006 debut albums Category:Atlantic Records albums Category:Skye Edwards albums
title: Mind How You Go (Skye Edwards album)
